name: @apicurio/data-models
description: A library to read, write, and manipulate OpenAPI and AsyncAPI content.

scripts.package: rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-package.json && cpx package.json dist && cpx module/*.* dist && mkdirp ./dist/bundles && webpack
scripts.package-rollup: rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig-package.json && cpx package.json dist && cpx module/*.* dist && mkdirp ./dist/bundles && rollup -c rollup.config.js
